1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-private-messages
1.0.1.description:
WP Private Messages is a plugin for messaging each others. It requires minimum user level 0. You can send or recieve messages, and of course, reply.

For more information, please visit our offical page

Plugin Features

  • When you send messages, you can choose if you wanna save that message to your sent box.
  • If you recieved a new message, you'll see a notice on dashboard screen
  • You have to choose a member to send message, so I coded a simple member listing page.
